page.title: 03Clubs.
page.content: There are a variety of clubs and societies in and around.On the outskirts of Dufftown we have Dufftown Golf Club.There are facilities for bowling,both indoor and outdoor. Adjacent to these are the all_weather tennis courts. There are the usual juvenile societies :Brownies,Girl Guides,Cubs and Scouts. In Dufftown there is another Juvenile Society which has it's annual walk and ball on New Years Day. There is a thriving Badminton club in the village which is held in the school every week.There are the following clubs:Bridge,Country Dancing,Football,Judo,Keep Fit,Over Sixties,Playgroup,Pipe Band and Rifle Club.
